reviewText: The ending, omg the ending. I liked the movie, the acting and all, but the ending made my jaw drop. Very sad, but loving.

The story line is interesting and the actors (Kwon Sang Woo, Jung Ryeo-Won, w/a fun surprise cameo by Kim Min Joon) were, overall, great.  But the rude and crude language was just over the top and quite surprising to me.  I love Korean dramas and part of the reason I do is because they are usually family friendly with out all the garbage that American media has come to embrace.  I don't know if it's the difference between Korean dramas (made for television) and movies made for the theatre, but this movie was a huge disappointment as a result.
